infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: We need camera access so you can take photos for your listings.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: We need photo library access so you can upload images from your device.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: yasla-vendor needs access to your location to provide accurate services based on your position.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: yasla-vendor may need location access even in background for certain features.
